name: Lost Eden
description: An adventure-strategy game in a world never before imaginedExplore seven types of 3D terrain and enjoy sophisticated cinematicsMeet more than 12 species of talking dinosaursGet a pterodactyl's-eye view in texture-mapped traveling sequencesWith full speech throughout and an original musical score
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 Storage: 357 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 Storage: 1 MB available space
